original_text: Moses took two flat loaves of bread that they had made without yeast and a biscuit. He took them from the basket that was in front of the Lord. One of the loaves had oil in it. He put them on top of the fat and the leg.
korean_text: 여호와 앞 무교병 광주리에서 무교병 한 개와 기름 섞은 떡 한 개와 전병 한 개를 가져다가 그 기름 위에와 오른쪽 뒷다리 위에 놓아

sentences.original_text: Moses took two flat loaves of bread
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 납작한 빵 두 조각을 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: that they had made without yeast
He took them from the basket
that was in front of the Lord.
One of the loaves had oil in it.
sentences.korean_translation: 빵 중 하나에는 기름이 들어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He put them on top of the fat
